QuestData.Title: In The Flesh
QuestData.Description:
The souls of the fallen kyrian... I can sense their pain and confusion. They yet exist within the construct!
Please, we must not destroy it. Doing so would consign the souls within it--the souls of my brethren--to oblivion.
Perhaps... perhaps they can aid us in escaping to freedom. I will soothe the souls within the construct while you direct its actions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take control of the Soulfused Construct and escape the House of Constructs.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Regroup with Aspirant Thales and the others at the Spider's Watch overlook.
QuestData.RewardText:
We escaped!
We will recuperate here for now. At least until we find a way to return to Bastion.
Thank you for showing me what courage is, my friend.

Objectives.Objective: Take control of the Soulfused Construct
